comment.body: I cannot read chinese, but it is a good Play alternative for chinese people. I really like such zites.
IMO the main disadvantage of the zite is centralization. It would be better with the merger feature.

@Krixano: I agree that ZeroMe use the merger feature in not a good way and mostly useless. I think, every user's profile should be on its own hub. Comments should be on the hub of post's author. And for better interoperability, user profile info and post previews (with tags) can be stored on shared hub.

But there is a problem. To publish a new zite/hub is not easy if the port  15441 is closed. Maybe blogs on standalone hubs should be an optional feature.
@Mynameislegion: libgen. But I think you will have to buy few hard drives for downloading it.
@Lola: A zeronet wikia.com alternative with merger feature would be nice.
Human beings are vulnerable. It is not so hard to create botnets.
